column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////It's definitely better to have it made-to-order vs. the pre-made personal size pizzas
column2: but it does take a while to come out. Their sausage is my favorite topping
column3: and I think the sauce is about as good as it gets. I like the thickness of the crust
column4: but it would be better if they actually filled the deep dish pizza pan. I'm not complaining about the amount of food
column5: I'm just saying it looks skimpy.
